sense.def:
Kdor je
qualified
, je opravil vse izpite, ki so potrebni, da lahko dela v določenem poklicu.

To be qualified to do something
pomeni imeti potrebne sposobnosti, znanje ali spretnosti za tisto opravilo.

seg.quote: She did not feel qualified to discuss it.

sense.def:
Dogovor ali pohvala, ki je
qualified
, ni popoln in nakazuje zadržanost in dvome.

seg.quote: The reaction was one of qualified praise.
